topic.title: BREAKING: GAB SUSPENDED FROM GOOGLE PLAY FOR HATE SPEECH #GREATSHUTTERING
topic.body:
BREAKING: GAB SUSPENDED FROM GOOGLE PLAY FOR HATE SPEECH #GREATSHUTTERING
AUGUST 17, 2017

Gab, a competitor to Twitter, has been removed from Google Play for violating Google Play’s hate speech policy. Gab revealed the decision, ironically, on the company’s Twitter account.

topic.title: Anyone has a working link to a safe torrent for Microsoft Office 2016?
topic.body: On Piratebay the most popular ones are shit and install malware on your PC.

topic.title: Looking for websites with lots of book torrents / pdfs
topic.body:
Schools books, normal books etc. Could you guys give me a list with useful links?

Also im looking for the pdf of this book in particular: Spartan Discipline: How to Develop Spartan Discipline, Unbreakable Mental Toughness, and Relentless Willpower
